events.text:
Hello?

. . . .
Is someone there?
Yes. Hello .
Who are you?
I’m [player_name] and and I am here to solve the mystery of the 3 murders’ case.

[shake rate=5 level=10]What?[/shake]

3 murders??
Yes, last night 3 murders were committed.
Oh my god! How can that be possible?
I am wondering the same but It seems it was one person of the mansion.

No way!

Who are the other dead people?
Margarita and Jurgen.
I can’t believe it. Who can have something against them?
I don’t know yet but I have already talked with them and I would like to ask you about that.
About what?
What was your relationship with Margarita?
We were classmates and good friends, that’s why I invited her yesterday.
Okay, I see. Did you invite anyone else?
Yes, I invited Nicole and my best friend too.
Who is your best friend?
Heidi.
You look very sad.
Yes, we didn’t end up well and now I am not going to see her never again…
Yeah, Margarita told me you argued yesterday. What happened?
I was in my room when Heidi showed up. She looked worried and angry at the same time.
What did she talk about?

I am not sure. She was so nervous that she could barely speak.

She said something about a crime she saw in a newspaper in which Nathan was allegedly stated to have committed a crime.
A crime? Hmm...
Yeah , I couldn’t believe my eyes.
And why do you think she was that mad at you?
We were a little bit distant the last two weeks because I have been very busy and I didn’t have much time to hang out with her.
But I don't think that's a valid reason to be angry with someone and much less if it's  your best friend.

Yeah… I know. 

Maybe I haven't been that honest with her lately.
What do you mean?
I was kind of dating someone I wasn’t supposed to and I didn’t tell her.
Why?

I don't know. They preferred to keep it just between them and I.

I wanted to respect that even though she is my best friend.

I think I know what's happening here.

Your friend was right. There is a crime and she was trying to warn you.

What?

[shake rate=5 level=10]No way![/shake] That’s impossible.

He was always so sweet and gentle. Always had other people’s best interests in mind.

Well, sometimes appearances can be deceiving.

The police is investigating his past right now because he is accused of a murder back in California on November 1st but still they need proof.
I still can’t believe she would do that. I am in shock.

Pull it together. I still more information about how the three of you died.

What was the last thing you remember?

Right after Heidi told me that, I went after Nathan since I was supposed to meet him in the billiard room. I went downstairs and I waited for about 5 minutes but no one was there.

Suddenly everything faded into black and  I fainted.
Okay, I will make sure to get to the buttom of it.
